sourcesContent:
<template>
  <ag-grid-vue
    style="height: 900px;"
    class="ag-theme-balham"
    :columnDefs="columnDefs"
    :rowData="rowData"
    rowHeight="200"
  ></ag-grid-vue>
</template>

<script>
import { AgGridVue } from "ag-grid-vue";
import AvatarRenderer from "./components/AvatarRenderer.vue";
import AccountDetailsRenderer from "./components/AccountDetailsRenderer.vue";

export default {
  name: "App",
  data() {
    return {
      columnDefs: null,
      rowData: null
    };
  },
  components: {
    AgGridVue,
    AvatarRenderer,
    AccountDetailsRenderer
  },
  beforeMount() {
    this.columnDefs = [
      {
        field: "imageUrl",
        cellRendererFramework: "AvatarRenderer",
        width: 175
      },
      {
        field: "accountDetails",
        cellRendererFramework: "AccountDetailsRenderer",
        width: 500
      },
      { cellRenderer: "" }
    ];

    this.rowData = [
      {
        imageUrl: "/assets/lucaslepri.jpg",
        accountDetails: {
          userName: "lucaslepri",
          name: "LUCAS LEPRI",
          following: true
        }
      },
      {
        imageUrl: "/assets/taylorswift.jpg",
        accountDetails: {
          userName: "taylorswift",
          name: "Taylor Swift",
          following: true
        }
      },
      {
        imageUrl: "/assets/leomessi.jpg",
        accountDetails: {
          userName: "leomessi",
          name: "Leo Messi",
          following: false
        }
      }
    ];
  }
};
</script>

<style lang="scss">
$cell-horizontal-border: blue;
$border-color: blue;

@import "../node_modules/ag-grid-community/dist/styles/ag-grid.css";
@import "../node_modules/ag-grid-community/dist/styles/ag-theme-balham.css";

.ag-theme-balham .ag-cell {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
}
</style>
